archimate:Capability.name: C3. Forecast capacity and demand
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to: - forecast demand at an aggregate level, accounting for different variables e.g. marketing campaigns or adjustments to screening pathways - forecast capacity at an aggregate level e.g. number of participants that can be seen at a particular screening unit per month
to ensure alignment between demand and capacity.

properties.value: Understanding both capacity and demand at each Screening Unit
Awareness of any mismatches between capacity and demand to inform intervention
